nodes.text: Shelkry Zepwim was a Human female underboss of the Blast Crew gang operating in the Free Zone, a black market on Asylum, a space station in Wild Space functioning as a shadowport. Armed with a blaster shotgun, vibrosword and a jump pack-like device, Zepwim fought in the gang war between the Blast Crew and the Starbolts in 3631 BBY. She was killed by The Commander and HK-55, who were on-the-run by the Eternal Empire, and searching for a crew member named Tora.
Shelkry Zepwim appears in Chapter VI: Asylum in Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 digital expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
